description:
In fixing bug 928910, I focused on libvirt/KVM since that was the original bug report and I don't know enough about the Xen and VMWare virt drivers to apply a corresponding efficient implementation of the new instance_exists() and get_num_instances() methods of the base drivers.

See https://review.openstack.org/#change,4061 for more details.
title: Need more efficient implementation of get_num_instances() and instance_exists() in Xen and VMWare virt drivers

comments.content:

comments.content: Since this bug has been open a year without any activity, I'm going to move it to "Opinion / Wishlist", which is a queue of older requests that have come on.  It can be reopened if someone decides to work on this (if it is even still relevant at this point).
